title: ciranjIviyAi iruppOm
sahitya:
ciranjIviyAi iruppOm sIrum kuTraiyum shiva mantirattAl jeyippOm manamE


anupallavi

  aram poruL inbamum adyAtma siddhiyum amarAnanda shaktiyum aDaindu jIvan muktarAi


caraNam    kadiravan shuDarinaik-kaDum puyal aNaikkumO karaiyillAk-kaDalinaik-kaTTugaL piNaikkumO
padiyuDan porundiya parama suddhAnmAvai pAsha nAsha vinaigaL paTri varuttiDumO
